statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, next_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE mechanic_name = 'John Doe' AND next_maintenance_date < DATE '2022-12-31';
SELECT mechanic_name, mechanic_contact FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE mechanic_contact LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY mechanic_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < DATE '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
SELECT maintenance_type, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY next_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, mechanic_name, mechanic_contact FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < DATE '2022-11-30' ORDER BY next_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, mechanic_contact, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE mechanic_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC, vehicle_id DESC;

SELECT vehicles.vehicle_id, vehicles.vehicle_type, maintenance_logs.maintenance_description FROM vehicles JOIN maintenance_logs ON vehicles.vehicle_id = maintenance_logs.vehicle_id WHERE maintenance_logs.maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(log_id) AS maintenance_count FROM vehicles LEFT JOIN maintenance_logs ON vehicles.vehicle_id = maintenance_logs.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) >= 3;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' OR vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'car';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_cost > 500;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_action, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_action, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_action, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_logs JOIN maintenance_schedule ON maintenance_logs.vehicle_id = maintenance_schedule.vehicle_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, next_maintenance_date FROM vehicles WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE LENGTH(task_description) > 20;
SELECT schedule_id, vehicle_id, task_id, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT history_id, maintenance_completed FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'car';
SELECT vehicle_type, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT vehicles.vehicle_id, maintenance_tasks.task_name FROM vehicles JOIN maintenance_schedule ON vehicles.vehicle_id = maintenance_schedule.vehicle_id JOIN maintenance_tasks ON maintenance_schedule.task_id = maintenance_tasks.task_id WHERE vehicles.vehicle_type = 'truck';

SELECT maintenance_tasks.task_name, maintenance_schedule.scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN maintenance_tasks ON maintenance_schedule.task_id = maintenance_tasks.task_id WHERE maintenance_schedule.vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT maintenance_history.history_id, maintenance_history.maintenance_date FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_history.maintenance_completed = true ORDER BY maintenance_history.maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year, mileage FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, specialty, experience_years FROM Technicians WHERE experience_years >= 5;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT v.*, m.* FROM Vehicle v JOIN MaintenanceSchedule m ON v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id;
SELECT t.name, t.specialty, w.work_description FROM Technicians t JOIN WorkOrders w ON t.technician_id = w.technician_id;
SELECT p.part_name, p.part_type, pi.quantity FROM PartsInventory p JOIN PartsInventory pi ON p.part_id = pi.part_id WHERE pi.quantity > 50;
